bank.title: Linear Algebra for Team-Based Inquiry Learning: 2024 Edition PREVIEW

outcome.title: READINESS: Systems of Linear Equations
outcome.description: Be prepared to engage with LE learning outcomes.

outcome.title: Linear systems, vector equations, and augmented matrices
outcome.description: Translate back and forth between a system of linear equations, a vector equation, and the corresponding augmented matrix.

outcome.title: Reduced row echelon form
outcome.description: Explain why a matrix isn't in reduced row echelon form, and put a matrix in reduced row echelon form.

outcome.title: Counting solutions for linear systems
outcome.description: Determine the number of solutions for a system of linear equations or a vector equation.

outcome.title: Linear systems with infinitely-many solutions
outcome.description: Compute the solution set for a system of linear equations or a vector equation with infinitly many solutions.

outcome.title: READINESS: Euclidean Vectors
outcome.description: Be prepared to engage with EV learning outcomes.

outcome.title: Linear combinations
outcome.description: Determine if a Euclidean vector can be written as a linear combination of a given set of Euclidean vectors by solving an appropriate vector equation.

outcome.title: Spanning sets
outcome.description: Determine if a set of Euclidean vectors spans R^n by solving appropriate vector equations.

outcome.title: Subspaces
outcome.description: Determine if a subset of R^n is a subspace or not.

outcome.title: Linear independence
outcome.description: Determine if a set of Euclidean vectors is linearly dependent or independent by solving an appropriate vector equation.

outcome.title: Basis identification
outcome.description: Explain why a set of Euclidean vectors is or is not a basis of R^n.

outcome.title: Basis of a subspace
outcome.description: Compute a basis for the subspace spanned by a given set of Euclidean vectors, and determine the dimension of the subspace.

outcome.title: Homogeneous systems
outcome.description: Find a basis for the solution set of a homogeneous system of equations.

outcome.title: READINESS: Algebraic Properties of Linear Maps
outcome.description: Be prepared to engage with AT learning outcomes.

outcome.title: Linear maps
outcome.description: Determine if a map between Euclidean vector spaces is linear or not.

outcome.title: Standard matrices
outcome.description: Translate back and forth between a linear transformation of Euclidean spaces and its standard matrix, and perform related computations.

outcome.title: Image and kernel
outcome.description: Compute a basis for the kernel and a basis for the image of a linear map, and verify that the rank-nullity theorem holds for a given linear map.

outcome.title: Injectivity and surjectivity
outcome.description: Determine if a given linear map is injective and/or surjective.

outcome.title: Vector spaces
outcome.description: Explain why a given set with defined addition and scalar multiplication does satisfy a given vector space property, but nonetheless isn't a vector space.

outcome.title: Polynomial and matrix spaces
outcome.description: Answer questions about vector spaces of polynomials or matrices.

outcome.title: Multiplying matrices
outcome.description: Multiply matrices.

outcome.title: The inverse of a matrix
outcome.description: Determine if a matrix is invertible, and if so, compute its inverse.

outcome.title: Solving systems with inverse matrices
outcome.description: Find the unique solution for a system of equations using an inverse matrix.

outcome.title: Row operations as matrix multiplication
outcome.description: Express row operations through matrix multiplication.

outcome.title: Row operations and determinants
outcome.description: Describe how a row operation affects the determinant of a matrix.

outcome.title: Determinants
outcome.description: Compute the determinant of a 4x4 matrix.

outcome.title: Eigenvalues
outcome.description: Find the eigenvalues of a 2x2 matrix.

outcome.title: Eigenvectors
outcome.description: Find a basis for the eigenspace of a 4x4 matrix associated with a given eigenvalue.

outcome.title: Multiple Choice Midterm
outcome.description: Answer MCQs based on learning outcomes LE1-EV4.

outcome.title: Comprehensive Final
outcome.description: Answer questions comprehensive over the course.
